newsitem.title: USA: Alliant Techsystems wins $13 mln contract.
newsitem.headline: Alliant Techsystems wins $13 mln contract.

text.p: Alliant Techsystems Inc said Wednesday it was awarded a $13 million contract from the U.S. Army for ammunition for its Conventional Munitions Group.

Production work on 4,100 rounds of 120mm tactical ammunition for use by the U.S. Army's M1A1/A2 Abrams main battle tank will be at Alliant's manufacturing facilities in Radford, Va., Toone, Tenn. and Totowa, N.J.

Alliant Techsystems' Conventional Munitions Group reported fiscal year 1997 sales of $499 million. Alliant Techsystems is a $1.1 billion aerospace and defense company with about 6,700 employees and operations in 23 states.
